name: House Clicker (MEMOLI games)
description: The game is simulation style. The game gives 2 coins (game money) every time you click, more coins can be given when you click by increasing the click levels in the game. There is a furniture market in the game, this furniture gives you a certain amount of diamonds (rare game currency). There is a promote code panel in the game, and you are given a promote code in in-game diamond sales via social media, and when you enter that code, you are given a specific diamond. You can turn the game sound on or off in the Settings panel. The game is at version 1.0.0 and will be further developed.
